Mailing Address: c/o Kelowna Arts Council799 Young RdKelowna, BC     V1W 2K7
Primary Contact: Lynda Norman, Executive Director; Email: lyndanorman@shaw.ca
Service Details: - Dedicated to enriching lives through creative awareness and artistic education, building community through alliances and strengthening relationships- Inspires creativity, creates opportunities, provides a means for people to experience art (in all its forms) and helps make the arts accessible to all- Through public and private sector support of art, artists and arts organizations, Kelowna’s vibrant arts scene will continue to grow, providing many benefits to the community- Volunteer opportunities available
How to Apply: Please visit the webpage for more information, to donate, or to volunteer
Former Name: Association of Artists for Creative Alliance
